Package controller

Interface HumanPlayerInterfaceController

public interface HumanPlayerInterfaceController
Is a level of indirection between the human interface and and the control layer. Provides methods for handling the multiple choice case, and for unlocking and locking the interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void lock​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler)
    Locks the player's interface.
    void multipleChoice​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<model.Card>> choices)
    Handles the case where a player has multiple choices.
    void unlock​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler)
    Unlock the player's interface.

  • Method Details

    • multipleChoice

      void multipleChoice​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<model.Card>> choices)
      Handles the case where a player has multiple choices. Via the interface the player will be asked to choose one.
      Parameters:
      humanPlayerHandler - handler of the player
      choices - all possible choices

    • lock

      void lock​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler)
      Locks the player's interface. In this way player can't play when it's not his turn.
      Parameters:
      humanPlayerHandler - the human player to be locked

    • unlock

      void unlock​(controller.HumanPlayerHandler humanPlayerHandler)
      Unlock the player's interface. It is called when it is the player's turn
      Parameters:
      humanPlayerHandler - handler of the player
